member.name: NMPGHOTITEM
member.summary: Contains information used with the PGN_HOTITEMCHANGE notification code.

member.name: NMPGHOTITEM.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains additional information about the notification.

member.name: NMPGHOTITEM.idOld
member.summary: Value of type int that specifies the command identifier of the previously highlighted item.

member.name: NMPGHOTITEM.idNew
member.summary: Value of type int that specifies the command identifier of the highlighted item.

summary.para: DWORD that contains flags that indicate why the hot item has changed. This can be one or more of the following values.

listheader.description: If this flag is set, there is no previous hot item and idOld does not contain valid information.
If this flag is set, there is no new hot item and idNew does not contain valid information.
